an5.103:1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an5.103:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacāgī ca, ekacārī ca.
an5.103:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro nadīviduggaṃ vā nissito hoti pabbatavisamaṃ vā.
an5.103:2.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro tiṇagahanaṃ vā nissito hoti rukkhagahanaṃ vā rodhaṃ vā mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ vā.
an5.103:3.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ vā nissito hoti.
an5.103:4.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5.103:4.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
an5.103:4.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano mahābhogo.
an5.103:5.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ito bhogena paṭisantharissāmī’ti.
an5.103:5.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tato bhogena paṭisantharati.
an5.103:5.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro bhogacāgī hoti.
an5.103:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahācoro ekakova gahaṇāni kattā hoti.
an5.103:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, mahācoro ekacārī hoti.
an5.103:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato mahācoro sandhimpi chindati nillopampi harati ekāgārikampi karoti paripanthepi tiṭṭhati.
an5.103:8.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
an5.103:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca, balavanissito ca, bhogacāgī ca, ekacārī ca.
an5.103:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamena kāyakammena samannāgato hoti, visamena vacīkammena samannāgato hoti, visamena manokammena samannāgato hoti.
an5.103:9.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an5.103:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu micchādiṭṭhiko hoti antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
an5.103:10.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an5.103:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattānaṃ vā nissito hoti.
an5.103:11.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ime me rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantī’ti.
an5.103:11.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tyassa rājāno vā rājamahāmattā vā pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
an5.103:11.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an5.103:12.4: ‘sace maṃ koci kiñci vakkhati, ito lābhena paṭisantharissāmī’ti.
an5.103:12.5: Sace naṃ koci kiñci āha, tato lābhena paṭisantharati.
an5.103:12.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu bhogacāgī hoti.
an5.103:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu ekakova paccantimesu janapadesu nivāsaṃ kappeti.
an5.103:13.3: So tattha kulāni upasaṅkamanto lābhaṃ labhati.
an5.103:13.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pāpabhikkhu ekacārī hoti.
an5.103:14.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavatī”ti.
